Content: Sri Lanka Navy ship ‘Sayurala’ sailed to Pakistan to take part in the Aman Naval exercise conducted by the Pakistan Navy. The ship is scheduled to reach Karachchi on the 7th of this month to take part in the Naval Exercises on the following day. There is a crew of 170 on board the ship. Identifying common needs, ocean security operations, anti-terrorist operations, rescue operations and several other training exercises would be conducted during the program. Navy ships belonging to 44 countries including Australia, Canada, China and Italy will join the Aman Naval Exercise.
